华东(恒台)玉米生产 | 农业生产资料生产

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches:
The study starts from the mining of ores and energy related to the life cycle of summer maize. The termination boundary is the output of pollutants and agricultural products during crop planting management."
"The accounting system boundary i
研究的起始边界从与夏玉米生命周期有关的 矿石和能源开采开始终止边界为作物种植管理输 出农产品和污染物

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The energy and water consumption in the raw material and agricultural input stages are based on the 'China Statistical Yearbook' (2005-2008), 'China Environmental Yearbook' (2004-2006), and 'China Energy Statistical Yearbook' (2004-2006). The data related to the planting stage comes from field records. Main atmospheric pollutants and water pollutants include SO2, CH4, CO2, CO, N2O, COD, NH3, and NOx, etc. The emission coefficients come from domestic publicly published literature

原料阶段和农资阶段的能耗、水耗等技术经济 指标来自《中国统计年鉴》（2005～2008）、《中国环 境年鉴》（2004～2006）、《中国能源统计年鉴》（2004 ～2006）、《中国化学工业年鉴》（2006）和《中国电力 年鉴》（2005～2006）等种植阶段的相关数据来自 田间记录．各阶段主要的大气污染物和水污染物包 括ＳＯ2、ＣＨ4、ＣＯ2、ＣＯ、Ｎ2Ｏ、ＣＯＤ、ＮＨ3和ＮＯｘ等其 排放系数来自国内公开发表文献（狄向华等2005； 胡志远等2006；段宁2007）．种植阶段与碳、氮有 关的各种排污系数来自中国农业大学山东桓台实 验站及其它研究机构在华北平原开展的研究报道
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: Divided into three steps: characterization, normalization, and weighted assessment."
分为特 征化、标准化和加权评估3个步骤

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 王明新吴文良夏训峰．2010．华北高产粮区夏玉米生命周期环境影响评价［Ｊ］．环境科学学报30（6）：1339—1344
王明新吴文良夏训峰．2010．华北高产粮区夏玉米生命周期环境影响评价［Ｊ］．环境科学学报30（6）：1339—1344

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.samplingProcedure: Four nitrogen application treatments from the fertilizer experiment of summer maize in 2003-2004 at the Shandong Hantai Experimental Station of China Agricultural University were selected as typical research subjects. The four nitrogen fertilizer application rates were 0, 100, 200, 300 kg·hm-2·a-1, represented as N0, N1, N2, N3 respectively.
中国农业大学山东桓台实验站2003～ 2004年夏玉米肥料实验的4个施氮处理为典型研 究对象4个氮肥处理用量分别是0、100、200、300 ｋｇ·ｈｍ—2·ａ—1分别以Ｎ0、Ｎ1、Ｎ2、Ｎ3表示

completeness.other: 原料阶段的影响包括矿石和化石能源开采等 引起的能源与资源消耗及污染排放；农资阶段的影 响有农用化学品生产所导致的大量能源消耗和废 水、废气及污染物排放；种植阶段的影响包括整地、 灌溉、施肥、病虫害防治等管理措施引起的燃料、电 力、水资源消耗及径流、淋溶、挥发等过程的污染物 排放；各阶段中运输过程的影响主要是燃料消耗及 由此产生的尾气排放

The impacts during the raw material phase include energy and resource consumption as well as pollution emissions caused by the extraction of ores and fossil fuels. The impacts during the agricultural input phase include substantial energy consumption and the emissions of wastewater, exhaust gases, and pollutants due to the production of agrochemicals. The impacts during the planting phase include the consumption of fuel, electricity, water resources, and the emissions of pollutants through processes such as soil preparation, irrigation, fertilization, and pest control. The impacts during the transportation processes in all stages are mainly due to fuel consumption and the resultant exhaust emissions.

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.; Documentation: The review of the documentation was performed by Ecobilan and is in compliance with ISO 14040 and 14044. The data set documentation is correct in view of the appropriateness of the information provided. It includes all relevant information in view of data quality and scope of application of the respective LCI result.
